body: Apologies for the kibitzing, but if you rearrange the `name` method so that it gets inlined, does that help? (Glancing at the code on my phone, it appears that this discussion through `data` could be simplified to possibly achieve this.) Just because only 3% is spent in the function doesn't mean that's the only costâ€”there's the call itself and the impact on optimization that comes from having a call in the middle of an otherwise basic block.
